snippet: Two new reality shows, “Doomsday Preppers” on the National Geographic Channel and “Doomsday Bunkers” on Discovery, feature people preparing for some kind of apocalypse.
abstract: Two reality television shows, Doomsday Preppers on the National Geographic Channel, and Doomsday Bunkers on Discovery, feature people preparing for some kind of apocalypse.
lead_paragraph: Two new reality shows, “Doomsday Preppers” on the National Geographic Channel and “Doomsday Bunkers” on Discovery, feature people preparing for some kind of apocalypse.

headline.main: Doomsday Has Its Day in the Sun
